column4: yes... I guess the long uneeded explanation is that I need authoritative, accurate, and timely solutions... not archives that require days of fiddling which I have zero time for
yup, never said it wasn't... but logically and easily deduce-able by my statements and initial query are the fact that I don't know how to do it
not in the mood for pissing contests
yup... it is a pissing contest if nothing else by your 'I can see now you are just lazy' thanks for giving oss another black eye... move on
